Text:
The video quality is good 9/10

But, the audio is messed up. There is an echo after the voices. So, you will hear everything twice as if you were listening through a hollow can. 

Might wanna look for another version.
from what i've read it depends on what player your using weather the sound is funny or not has german or some thing in front of english audio

I didn't hear an echo, I didn't watch the whole movie yet but I clicked at a few random spots and watched 10 or 15 seconds and everything seemed fine, and its not a fake, its DVD quality. BTW i used Realplayer
The sound is out of sync, is anybody else having that problem when they convert it to dvd with divx to dvd or while playing it on the computer?
yeah its probly your recorder i had the same prob tell i switched dvd burners
